<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Levering Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1196) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)

**Prerequisites**
[Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193)

**Requirements**
You are wielding your staff.

</column>

---

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don’t critically fail, the target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) and takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its DC against [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), and [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) attempts until the start of your next turn.
